inclusion.criterion: Spina bifida as a sole urologic diagnosis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Informed consent and assent (7 years of age and older)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Immunosuppression from corticosteroids, transplant recipients or children with congenital immunodeficiencies
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Chronic indwelling catheters in the bladder
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: had a foley and leaked around it

notes: 78 year-old male with history of BPH, multiple urological procedures, including suprapubic prostatectomy. Had severe urethral stricture and required surgical intervention.
